name: bloc'd
description:
Draw and connect colored blocks to match the falling shapes before they get to the spikes.

Shapes get faster, and more complex. The simplest of games can be the most challenging.

Double-tap to remove one block. Upgrade to get unlimited double-taps (free is limited to 5 per game), Plus get bonus powers that remove or freeze the falling shapes!


New Game Type! Want a more relaxed game with no time limits? You've got 25 moves and 3 shapes at a time to match. Make every block count. Bonus move: Swipe at the top to rotate the 3 shapes!
